K12D0484_H0452:96a-0: @96a / /dur khrod dag dang bshan pa yi //
K12D0484_H0452:96b-0: khyim dang srin @96b po'i gnas rnams su //
K12D0484_H0452:96b-1: mngon spyod kyi ni las bya ba //
K12D0484_H0452:96b-2: tha ba khung tha ma bar ma mchog /
K12D0484_H0452:96b-3: phyed dang gsum mam khru gsum mam //
K12D0484_H0452:96b-4: khru dgu pa ni byas pa las //
K12D0484_H0452:96b-5: stegs bu de yi tshad brtsigs te //
K12D0484_H0452:96b-7: lugs phye sol phye dug gis ni //
K12D0484_H0452:96b-8: bskus pas thab khung nag por bya //
K12D0484_H0452:96b-9: dbus su rdo rje rtse dgu pa //
K12D0484_H0452:96b-10: nag po shin tu 'bar ba bri //
K12D0484_H0452:96b-11: mu ran steng du rtse gsum dang //
K12D0484_H0452:96b-12: rgya gram pa yi rdo rjes mtshan //
K12D0484_H0452:96b-13: de yi phyi rol mu khyud la //
K12D0484_H0452:96b-14: dbyug pa dang ni dgra sta dang //
K12D0484_H0452:96b-15: ral gri shin tu 'bar ba bri //
K12D0484_H0452:96b-16: de yi phyi rol keng rus te //
K12D0484_H0452:96b-17: bde gshegs la sogs phyag rgyas mtshan //
K12D0484_H0452:96b-18: dud sprin mdog 'dra drang srong mchog /
K12D0484_H0452:96b-19: ra yi steng bzhugs rtse gsum dang //
K12D0484_H0452:96b-20: gzar bu phreng ba ril bar ldan //
K12D0484_H0452:96b-21: de lta'i me lha spyan drangs nas //
K12D0484_H0452:96b-22: lhor bltas khros pa'i sems kyis bsreg /
K12D0484_H0452:96b-23: shin tu gdug cing tsher mar bcas //
K12D0484_H0452:96b-24: sreg shing yam shing byas nas kyang //
K12D0484_H0452:96b-25: sha dang khrag dang lcags phye dang //
K12D0484_H0452:96b-26: rus phye dug dang ke tshe dang //
K12D0484_H0452:96b-27: dri chen dri chu la sogs pa'i //
K12D0484_H0452:96b-28: rdzas rnams kun la dug gis ni //
K12D0484_H0452:96b-29: bsgos pas lan grangs 'bum bsregs nas //
K12D0484_H0452:96b-30: de yi longs spyod 'byor pa dang //
K12D0484_H0452:96b-31: gnyen dang 'khor dang bran rnams dang //
K12D0484_H0452:96b-32: bu dang chung mar bcas pa rnams //
K12D0484_H0452:96b-33: spangs te srog dang bral nas ni //
K12D0484_H0452:97a-2: mngon spyod kyi las rdzogs so ////
K12D0484_H0452:97a-3: rgya gar gyi mkhan po sh'antim garbha dang /
